title: Radiant Diamond Vanki Earrings - A Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: Crafted in 18 Karat Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
brilliant-cut Diamonds. Estimated total diamond weight of 2.22 carats (approximate: D PAN(-7):-1.60(54) & D MQ(-7):-0.62(22).
features: These earrings showcase a modern interpretation of the classic Vanki armlet design. The earrings feature a central circular motif with concentric diamond settings, framed by intricately arranged pear-shaped diamonds resembling floral petals. The openwork design allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the sparkle of the diamonds. Finished with a secure and comfortable post-back closure.
colors: Two-tone design: Warm rose gold (18K) complements the dazzling brilliance of the colorless diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire a touch of modern elegance and South Indian flair. These earrings will add a touch of glamour to your attire for a Seemantham
description: A unique blend of traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. High-quality diamonds ensure exceptional brilliance and lasting value. The lightweight design (Grwt:-13.500(GH)) provides comfortable wear. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, reflecting the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition. These earrings offer a timeless piece for your heirloom collection.
